entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler can't determine best common type for `switch` expression #71649

Closed

  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 when constructing an invalid implicitly type array of Func #71593
  • CSharpSyntaxNode.DeserializeFrom(stream) does not work #8676
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • IDE0051: Consider a record's private constructor as used #71650
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • WIP: Make list a collection builder type #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
